ResumeParserData.Experience: Senior Finance Analyst ABC Bank, Manchester, UK  June 2018 - Present  Conducted financial analysis, forecasting, and budgeting for various banking projects.  Utilized Excel, SAP, and Oracle for financial data analysis and reporting.  Prepared detailed financial reports and presentations for senior management.  Collaborated with cross-functional teams to support decision-making processes.  Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.  Finance Analyst XYZ Financial Services, Manchester, UK  January 2014 - May 2018  Assisted in financial analysis, budgeting, and forecasting for banking operations.  Developed financial models to support business planning and strategy.  Conducted variance analysis and provided insights to improve financial performance.  Prepared financial reports and presentations for stakeholders.  Supported the implementation of financial software tools and systems.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Ama is a talented Finance Analyst with seven years of experience. She excels in financial analysis and forecasting and is proficient in using financial software tools.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Ama has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Financial Analysts and Advisors'. The candidate has been working as a Senior Finance Analyst at ABC Bank for the last 6.10 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Ama doesn't have any management level experience in the resume.
